rows.text:
You reach a rocky landscape, interspersed with rugged massifs. A vague smell of sulfur hangs in the air. As you are considering whether to avoid this inhospitable area, you spot a steaming waterhole surrounded by rocks.[CTP]

Turquoise crystals give the edge of the pool an unreal color. You cough as the swaths of acrid steam sting your throats. Do you want to take a short break or leave immediately?
Inspect the water
Continue your journey

After a short inspection, you establish that the water is pleasantly warm but completely unpalatable. An initial foot bath leads to a refreshing group bath in the steaming mineral spring.

The warm water burns slightly at your wounds, but by the time you get dressed, you all feel wonderfully invigorated.

As you relax at the edge of the pool and let your feet dangle into the water, you suddenly see large bubbles rising from the bottom of the waterhole. Moments later, a barely perceptible vibration shakes the ground beneath you! [CTP]

You dive for safety - and not a second too soon: a towering fountain of super-heated water shoots past you and into the air! Your reflexes saved you from the worst of it, but [char0] has been scalded.

As you relax at the edge of the pool and let your feet dangle into the water, you suddenly see large bubbles rising from the bottom of the waterhole. Moments later, a barely perceptible vibration shakes the ground beneath you! [CTP]

You dive for safety - and not a second too soon: a towering fountain of super-heated water shoots past you and into the air! Your reflexes saved you from worst of it, but [char0] has been scalded.
Ambush your enemies
Leave this place unseen

The freshly churned up sand and the footprints around the entrance lead to just one conclusion: The ancient temple you have discovered here has visitors!

You give in to your curiosity and carefully enter the old ruins. You soon spot a squad of soldiers at work on the walls of the altar room. They haven’t noticed you yet!

The ancient building in front of you has taken some rough treatment: Decorative elements have been thrown carelessly to the floor, the door has been forced open. Could the perpetrators still be inside the temple?

A short time later, you sneak up on a squad of soldiers. They remain oblivious to your approach, as they are tapping on the walls of the temple’s main hall.

Muted voices rise from the heart of the secluded temple complex. You draw your weapons and decide to get to the bottom of this mystery.

Unseen, you sneak up on a group of soldiers who have sought shelter from the scorching sun in the cool temple interior.

The footprints you have been following lead you to the foundations of a deserted temple. You carefully enter the structure to find out more about its mysterious visitors.

You soon discover a squad of exhausted soldiers camping in the temple interior. They haven’t seen you yet!

You are startled by loud, excited shouts! You approach the source of the commotion and spot a squad of soldiers entering a desert temple.

You wait a few minutes and then follow them. You come across them again in the central hall of the temple. They still have not noticed you!
You come across an abandoned desert temple. As you explore the structure, you encounter a squad of soldiers searching its halls. They have not noticed you yet!

The footprints you have been following lead to the foundations of a deserted temple. You carefully enter the structure to find out more about its mysterious visitors.

You soon discover a large unit of exhausted soldiers camping in the temple interior. They have not seen you yet!

You are startled by loud, excited shouts! You approach the source of the commotion and spot a large detachment of soldiers entering a desert temple.

You wait a few minutes and then follow them. You come across them again in the central hall of the temple. They still have not noticed you!
You come across an abandoned desert temple. As you explore the structure, you come across a large squad of soldiers searching its halls. They have not noticed you yet!

You come across a deserted temple, half buried in the desert sand. After a short inspection, you find the entrance and dare to enter the temple.

You soon reach the central altar, when a noise startles you: You see a unit of soldiers with weapons drawn! It’s an ambush!

Beyond the next sand dune, ancient walls rise abruptly from the desert sands. It is a deserted temple! It does not take long to uncover the entrance. 

You set out to explore the complex – and run straight into a German ambush!

The temple in front of you looks desolate and deserted. It only takes you a few moments to get past the entrance.

After looking around for a while, you finally make it to the altar room. Suddenly, you are ambushed by a unit of German soldiers who have been following you unnoticed!

Between the sand dunes, you come across the outer walls of a temple complex. The entrance is half buried in the sand, but you soon manage to excavate it.

You explore the interior of the temple and finally enter the main vault. Unfortunately, you run directly into the guns of a squad of soldiers, who clearly found another way in!

The temple entrance has been smashed open using brute force. You ready your weapons and advance through the corridors until you finally arrive at the central room of the temple.

Unfortunately, you were noisy enough to alert the German soldiers who are waiting in ambush!
Full of curiosity, you enter the temple you discovered in the endless expanse of the desert - and run straight into a German ambush. They must have seen you coming!

An ancient building rises from the desert sand ahead of you: an abandoned temple! You inspect the building and find an entrance. You carefully work your way through the corridors.

As you reach a spacious vault, you hear a shout! You have been discovered by a squad of German soldiers!

The entrance to the temple in front of you has been smashed in. You enter the building with weapons drawn. Once inside, your suspicions are confirmed: A group of German soldiers are camping here! They have seen you!

The ancient, dilapidated building in front of you may once have been a temple. Curious, you start to explore it.

As you enter the altar room, you see a bored-looking German sentry leaning against a wall. He spots you too and alerts his comrades!

Even from a distance, the silhouette of the temple breaks the monotony of the desert horizon. As you enter its cool interior, you suddenly hear footsteps ahead of you.

Before you can react, a German soldier comes around the corner! He immediately dives for cover and alerts the rest of his unit! You must fight for your lives!

A lonely desert temple rises from the dunes ahead of you. The entrance is half buried, but you manage to squeeze through.

Inside, you find a squad of German soldiers around an improvised excavation site. You are spotted immediately and the enemy soldiers open fire!
As you explore the ancient temple you discovered among the desert dunes, you run straight into a detachment of soldiers! They are just as surprised as you are!
The camp in the ruins ahead of you seems deserted, until you realize the truth: You have fallen into an ambush!

You see an abandoned camp among some ruins. The campfire is no longer lit, but the ashes are fresh. Just how recent is this camp?

As if in response to your unspoken question, you hear a rustle behind you. You spin around to see a detachment of soldiers pointing their rifles at you! You have walked into an ambush!

The old camp in the ruins ahead of you seems deserted. You are not sure whether to trust in the apparent peacefulness of this place... 

Suddenly, a detachment of soldiers emerges from the shadows with weapons drawn and mocking grins on their faces! You have walked into an ambush!

You come across a burnt-out campfire among some abandoned ruins. A last wisp of smoke rises lazily into the air. The camp looks like it was abandoned in a hurry – what happened here? 

You hear the sound of jackboots behind you – to your dismay, you realize: You have walked into a German ambush!

From a distance, you spot an abandoned military camp among the ruins. All signs point to a hasty departure. Hoping to find more clues, you start to investigate the camp.

Only when German soldiers appear all around you with weapons drawn, do you realize that you have been ambushed!

You find the remains of a hastily abandoned camp in the ruins ahead of you. You make a quick search of the camp when you suddenly spot a movement out of the corner of your eye!

You look up and realize that you have been ambushed by a unit of German soldiers!
Attack
Withdraw
The unit of soldiers in the ruins ahead are completely unaware of you – an ambush is the last thing they expect!
A group of soldiers is encamped in some ruins up ahead of you. They have not noticed you yet!
You stumble across a German military camp. The soldiers lounge around listlessly in the ruins – they have not noticed you!
From afar you hear commands echoing in the desert air. You sneak closer and find a squad of soldiers setting up camp among some ruins.
The large detachment of soldiers in the ruins ahead of you did not think it necessary to set up guards as they clearly feel secure in their numerical advantage!
There is a large group of soldiers in the ruins up ahead of you. They do not appear to have noticed you yet!
As you walk around a ruined building, an enemy sentry spots you and sounds the alarm! You have startled a unit of German soldiers who are camping among the ruins!
Up ahead of you, a detachment of German soldiers are hunkered down among the ruins! They have seen you and are running for cover! Moments later, they open fire!
You hear a shout and a unit of soldiers jump up from the shadows of the ruins. You dive for cover – moments later the bullets begin to fly!

You don’t see the soldiers resting among the ruins until you are almost on top of them – they are as surprised as you are! They frantically grab their weapons and open fire! You rush for cover and return fire!

The soldiers in the ruins up ahead have not noticed you yet, so you decide to withdraw.

Suddenly, you hear a shout: The guards have spotted you! The Germans grab their weapons as you dive for cover!
As you approach the ruins, you hear a loud shout! The soldiers ahead of you are as surprised as you are!

You come across some crumbling ruins, possibly a long-abandoned caravansary. The desert wind and the scorching heat have not been kind to the blasted buildings.[CTP]

In the overgrown courtyard you find a dried-up well. You discover some rough steps that lead down the well shaft. The sand around the well has been churned up by numerous footprints.
Climb down

The mysterious well has triggered your interest. Without further ado, you climb down the stone protrusions that are built into the side of the well. After wandering the underground tunnels, you see the glow of several torches flickering on the walls of the vault ahead of you. Soon you hear loud, menacing voices. [CTP]

You peer carefully around the corner – to see a large group of German soldiers! In the middle of the group stands a prisoner who is being questioned aggressively by the soldiers. They are so engrossed in the interrogation that they do not notice you. You pause to decide what to do.
Continue your journey
You have an uneasy feeling about the old well. After a short pause, you continue on your journey.
Open fire
Silently, you sneak closer, scurrying from cover to cover. As soon as you are in position, you open fire!
Free the prisoner

It’s a bold plan – but it might just work. The soldiers bind their prisoner and then withdraw to their camp to consult out of earshot.[CTP]

[char0] dashes forwards from cover to cover until he finally reaches the prisoner! You see [char0] cut the bonds around the captive's ankles.

It’s a bold plan – but it might just work. The soldiers bind their prisoner and then withdraw to their camp to consult out of earshot.[CTP]

[char0] dashes forwards from cover to cover until she finally reaches the prisoner! You see [char0] cut the bonds around the captive's ankles.
[char0] returns triumphantly with the prisoner. You disappear before the soldiers notice a thing!
[char0] returns triumphantly with the prisoner. You disappear before the soldiers notice a thing!
Then you hear an angry shout! The soldiers have seen [char0]! Moments later, battle begins!
Then you hear an angry shout! The soldiers have seen [char0]! Moments later, battle begins!
Distract soldiers

[char1] picks up a stone and throws it into a pile of clay urns at the other end of the hall. The loud clattering alerts the soldiers. They grab their guns and run over to the urns![CTP]

Within seconds, [char1] is by the prisoner, cutting the bonds at his ankles. You disappear before the soldiers notice a thing!

[char1] picks up a stone and throws it into a pile of clay urns at the other end of the hall. The loud clattering alerts the soldiers. They grab their guns and run over to the urns![CTP]

Within seconds, [char1] is by the prisoner, cutting the bonds at his ankles. You disappear before the soldiers notice a thing!

[char1] picks up a stone and throws it into a pile of clay urns at the other end of the hall. The loud clattering alerts the soldiers!

They grab their weapons and rush out. They soon find you – a battle is unavoidable!

[char1] picks up a stone and throws it into a pile of clay urns at the other end of the hall. The loud clattering alerts the soldiers!

They grab their weapons and rush out. They soon find you – a battle is unavoidable!
Withdraw
As you withdraw, [char2] stumbles over a pile of rocks. The soldiers jump up in alarm!
As you withdraw, [char2] stumbles over a pile of rocks. The soldiers jump up in alarm!

You peer carefully over the ridge of the dune: A large unit of German troops are camped just beneath you. They have secured their camp with sandbags and are patrolling the grounds. Further back, you can see military jeeps and stockpiles. You look at each other: This won’t be easy...
Attack
Search enemy fuel dump

[char0] creeps carefully past the guard post and makes it to the fuel dump. After some time he returns, heavily laden with stolen jerrycans. 

Miraculously, he makes it through the enemy lines without raising an alarm! You perform a silent jig of happiness.

[char0] creeps carefully past the guard post and makes it to the fuel dump. After some time she returns, heavily loaded with contraband. 

Miraculously, she makes it through the enemy lines without raising an alarm! You perform a silent jig of happiness.
[char0] sneaks off and soon disappears behind the fuel dump. You suddenly hear shouting and shooting! Hastily, you prepare to fight!
[char0] sneaks off and soon disappears behind the fuel dump. You suddenly hear shouting and shooting! Hastily, you prepare to fight!
Continue your journey

Even from a distance, you can see that something is wrong in the village ahead of you, so you approach cautiously, using the low walls for cover. [CTP]

Your instincts did not deceive you: A group of German soldiers have occupied the village and are rounding up its inhabitants!
Attack
You check your ammunition and take your positions. Then you open fire! The farmers seek shelter in their huts when the Germans return fire.
Continue your journey

As the last shot dies away, the villagers cautiously emerge from their huts. The village elder thanks you profusely. Then he points despondently at the village well: [CTP]

[char1]: "The soldiers destroyed our well! Help us, or our livestock will die of thirst! "

You peer into the well shaft and realize that it has been blown up by a German hand grenade.
Bid farewell
You hope the farmers will be able to dig their own well again, because you don’t have time to do it for them. Regretfully, you bid farewell and move on.
Repair the well

[char0] nods and starts giving orders: Support beams are hauled into place, winches installed and the well is dug out again. It is not long before the well is at least operational again. The village elder is overjoyed:[CTP]

[char2]: "We are deeply in your debt! Take this gift as a token of our gratitude. The foreign soldiers searched for it without success, but we give it to you gladly!"

[char0] nods and starts giving orders: Support beams are hauled into place, winches installed and the well is dug out again. It is not long before the well is at least operational again. The village elder is overjoyed:[CTP]

[char2]: "We are deeply in your debt! Take this gift as a token of our gratitude. The foreign soldiers searched for it without success, but we give it to you gladly!"

[char0] shakes his head and says resignedly: 

[char0]: "The Germans knew what they were doing – the well is gone!" [CTP]

The villagers will have to find another waterhole somewhere else. Their mood is subdued as you bid farewell.

[char0] shakes her head and says resignedly: 

[char0]: "The Germans knew what they were doing – the well is gone!" [CTP]

The villagers will have to find another waterhole somewhere else. Their mood is subdued as you bid farewell.
You find the ancient walls of an abandoned temple. Lonely and majestic, the building rises from the endless desert sands. What secrets might it conceal?
Enter
The stairwell into this holy place is almost entirely clogged with sand. You squeeze down a half-buried passageway. A wave of cool, musty air hits you.
Inspect temple facade

The stairwell into this holy place is almost entirely clogged with sand. [CTP] 

You're about to squeeze down through the half-buried passageway, when [char0] notices an inconspicuous lever in the stone wall. You tug on the lever and a secret door slides open with a loud rumble!

The stairwell into this holy place is almost entirely clogged with sand. [CTP] 

You're about to squeeze down through the half-buried passageway, when [char0] notices an inconspicuous lever in the stone wall. You tug on the lever and a secret door slides open with a loud rumble!
You find nothing of importance. You shrug and enter the temple.
Read inscription

The stairwell into this holy place is almost entirely clogged with sand. You squeeze down through the half-buried passageway and finally arrive at an intersection. [char1] studies the hieroglyphics on the wall: 

[char1]: "The throne room is on the right!"

The stairwell inside this holy place is almost entirely clogged with sand. You squeeze down through the half-buried passageway and finally arrive at an intersection. [char1] studies the hieroglyphics on the wall: 

[char1]: "The throne room is on the right!"

[char1] studies the hieroglyphs on the wall, before shaking his head: 

[char1]: "They are completely illegible!"

You shrug and enter the temple.

[char1] studies the hieroglyphics on the wall, before shaking her head: 

[char1]: "They are completely illegible!"

You shrug and enter the temple.
Continue your journey

When you finally reach the central vault, you gasp in amazement: The flickering glow of your torches reveals an ancient altar. It has been millennia since priests offered their sacrifices here to an unknown god.

You approach the altar carefully to take a closer look! [CTP]

Suddenly, mocking laughter echoes off the chamber walls: 

[char4]: "I hope we are not disturbing you?"

You spin around to see a unit of German soldiers pointing their weapons at you!
You examine the altar and temple vault excitedly. You are in luck: you find a strange box in one of the surrounding niches. You can tell from the weight that it isn’t empty...

The narrow stone passageway leads ever deeper. After a while, you finally notice a change in the gradient: The passageway is leading upward again! [CTP]

Step by step you feel your way forward, when one of the flagstones suddenly shifts under your weight with an unpleasant grating sound. You hear a faint click and see a round, man-sized boulder come loose from the wall and start rolling slowly towards you!
Run forward to the next turnoff

With the courage of desperation, you rush towards the huge rock! You dive into the side corridor just as the huge rock thunders past you with a deafening crash! Drenched in sweat but unharmed, you continue.

With the courage of desperation, you rush towards the huge, ball-shaped rock – but the rock is moving faster than you thought! You race headlong back to the last turning – you only just make it around the corner when the massive rock thunders into the wall with a deafening crash! [CTP]

You spend some time trying to shove the rock aside, but the passage ahead is now blocked. You have no choice but to return to the entrance. [char2] curses and rubs his sprained ankle before hobbling after you.

With the courage of desperation, you rush towards the huge, ball-shaped rock – but the rock is moving faster than you thought! You race headlong back to the last turning – you only just make it around the corner when the massive rock thunders into the wall with a deafening crash! [CTP]

You spend some time trying to shove the rock aside, but the passage ahead is now blocked. You have no choice but to return to the entrance. [char2] curses and rubs her sprained ankle before hobbling after you.
Run back to the last turnoff

You race headlong back to the last turning – you only just make it around the corner when the massive rock thunders into the wall with a deafening crash! [CTP]

You spend some time trying to shove the rock aside, but the passage ahead is now blocked. You have no choice but to return to the entrance.

You race headlong back to the last turning – you only just make it around the corner when the massive rock thunders into the wall with a deafening crash! [CTP]

You spend some time trying to shove the rock aside, but the passage ahead is now blocked. Swearing, you rub your sore joints and bruised heads. You have no choice but to return to the entrance.
Stop the rock

With sudden resolve, [char3] throws himself against the rock! With an incredible effort, he manages to hold it back until you have all reached safety behind the next turnoff. Eventually, his strength fails him and he leaps after you. The huge rock thunders past you!

With sudden resolve, [char3] throws herself against the rock! With an incredible effort, she manages to hold it back until you have all reached safety behind the next turnoff. Eventually, her strength fails her and she leaps after you. The huge rock thunders past you!

With sudden resolve, [char3] throws himself against the rock! With an incredible effort, he manages to hold it back until you have all reached safety behind the last turning. Eventually, his strength fails him and he leaps after you. The huge rock smashes into the wall with a deafening crash just as he dives around the corner![CTP]

You spend some time attempting to push the rock aside, but the passage ahead is now blocked. You have no choice but to return to the entrance.

With sudden resolve, [char3] throws herself against the rock! With an incredible effort, she manages to hold it back until you have all reached safety behind the last turning. Eventually, her strength fails her and she leaps after you. The huge rock smashes into the wall with a deafening crash just as she dives around the corner![CTP]

You spend some time attempting to push the rock aside, but the passage ahead is now blocked. You have no choice but to return to the entrance.

As you approach the village, you hear the shouting of an angry crowd! A furious mob has gathered in front of one of the houses. You make out the village chief and speak to him:

[char0]: "What's going on here?"

[char4]: "The people have caught a con artist in the act and now they want blood."[CTP] 

You assess the situation: Isn’t that [char1]? He also recognizes you and waves frantically: 

[char1]: "It's all just a misunderstanding! Get me out of here!"

As you approach the village, you hear the shouting of an angry crowd! A furious mob has gathered in front of one of the houses. You make out the village chief and speak to him:

[char0]: "What's going on here?"

[char4]: "The people have caught a con artist in the act and now they want blood."[CTP] 

You assess the situation: Isn’t that [char1]? She also recognizes you and waves frantically: 

[char1]: "It's all just a misunderstanding! Get me out of here!"
Pay money

[char0]: "Perhaps compensation for any losses will calm things down?"

[char4]: "You can try, but it won’t be cheap!"

[char1]: "Don’t leave me here!"

Sighing, you gather your funds together and pay.
Threaten

[char3] strides out confidently, facing down the mob:

[char3]: "I don’t like it when people spread lies about my friends!"

[char3] strides out confidently, facing down the mob:

[char3]: "I don’t like it when people spread lies about my friends!"
[char3] does not look like he is joking. After a few words of protest, the grumbling crowd disperses.
[char3] does not look like she is joking. After a few words of protest, the grumbling crowd disperses.

A reluctant grumble goes through the crowd. Insults fly back and forth, the mood is getting ugly! The village chief grows impatient:

[char2]: "What do you mean, lies? We have a dozen witnesses! Will you pay now or not?" 

Cowed, you gather your funds together and pay.
Continue your journey

As you travel through the endless desert, you see a small herd of wild camels on your right, plodding across the dunes in the distance. You see a mother camel with its foal, both as white as freshly driven snow, lagging behind the rest of the herd.

After a few minutes, the shy animals turn and disappear among the dunes.
A traveling merchant has set up camp at this oasis. When he sees you, he hastily spreads out his wares and gesticulates wildly in your direction.
Trade
Continue your journey

The palm grove is pleasantly shady. As you relax and enjoy the shade, a cobra suddenly rears up from between some boulders! [CTP]

The angry snake sways from side to side. It spreads its hood and hisses – it is defending its territory!
Retreat!
You break out in a cold sweat! You withdraw slowly, doing your best to avoid antagonizing the enormous snake. Finally, you continue your journey.
Attack snake
[char0] draws his weapon and aims carefully as the snake's head sways from side to side increasingly aggressively.
[char0] draws her weapon and aims carefully as the snake's head sways from side to side increasingly aggressively.

[char0] pulls the trigger - a direct hit! With appropriate respect, you survey the huge creature lying lifeless at your feet.

After your initial shock subsides, you investigate the rest of the area.

[char0] pulls the trigger - a direct hit! With appropriate respect, you inspect the huge creature lying lifeless at your feet.

After your initial shock subsides, you investigate the rest of the area.
[char0] squeezes the trigger, but unfortunately he misses the animal. The cobra attacks! You run for your lives!
[char0] squeezes the trigger, but unfortunately she misses the animal. The cobra attacks! You run for your lives!

[char0] squeezes the trigger, but unfortunately he misses the animal by a hair’s breadth. The cobra darts forward and bites him on the wrist! 

He finally manages to shake off the serpent. You run for your lives before the enraged creature can strike again!

[char0] squeezes the trigger, but unfortunately she misses the animal by a hair’s breadth. The cobra darts forward and bites her on the wrist! 

She finally manages to shake off the serpent. You run for your lives before the enraged creature can strike again!
Continue your journey
Surprise attack

As if from nowhere, [char1] appears behind the snake! Something metallic flashes in his hands, then the snake collapses to the ground. 

[char1]: "Impressive... they rarely grow this big." [CTP]

With a few deft movements, [char1] skins and guts the snake. A short time later, a snake stew is simmering in your saucepan. You are skeptical at first, but the meat tastes surprisingly good.

After your initial shock subsides, you investigate the rest of the area.

As if from nowhere, [char1] appears behind the snake! Something metallic flashes in her hands, then the snake collapses to the ground. 

[char1]: "Impressive... they rarely grow this big." [CTP]

With a few deft movements, [char1] skins and guts the snake. A short time later, a snake stew is simmering in your saucepan. You are skeptical at first, but the meat tastes surprisingly good.

After your initial shock subsides, you investigate the rest of the area.

As if from nowhere, [char1] appears behind the snake! He makes a grab for it, but the animal slithers free! 

As fast as lightning, [char1] dives away from the attacking cobra and rolls out of danger. You run for your lives!

As if from nowhere, [char1] appears behind the snake! She makes a grab for it, but the animal slithers free! 

As fast as lightning, [char1] dives away from the attacking cobra and rolls out of danger. You run for your lives!
You find a German soldier lying face down in the sand. The man obviously had worse reflexes than you! You see a German army crate next to the body and grab it unceremoniously.

Hidden in a dry river bed, you find a waterhole with a few date palms growing at its banks. The date palms are heavy with fruit, so you decide to take a break in this shady spot. 

This is the perfect place to take an extended break. Do you want to rest here?
Take a long break
You pitch your camp. Exhausted, you allow yourself a short nap. After a short, dreamless sleep, you wake up reinvigorated. You break camp and set off again.
Continue journey
You check your gear one last time and start the engine: Your journey begins!

You see the fortified base of the Excavation Regiment Southwest on the valley plain ahead - you have finally reached your goal! As you are considering how to make it through the heavily guarded entrance, you suddenly spot a lone Wehrmacht jeep approaching your vehicle. [CTP]

You hide behind the rocks and wait for the patrol to disembark - then you take them by surprise and tie them up! 

A short time later, you drive into the German camp wearing "borrowed" uniforms. The bored-looking sentry waves your Wehrmacht jeep through with barely a glance - so far, so good...

Disguised as German soldiers, you search the camp complex - Morten must be here somewhere! Your hearts race as you pass unnoticed through the crowds of enemy soldiers! [CTP]

You suddenly notice a small motorcade setting off. As it drives past, you spot Morten in one of the cars - you immediately jump into your captured jeep and tag onto the end of the convoy as it exits the camp and heads into the desert!

After a few miles, the convoy stops at a smaller auxiliary base. You see Morten being led away - you don’t have much time! Your friend’s execution is imminent! [CTP] 

Suddenly, you hear a shout – you have been discovered! You look at each other with grim determination and load your weapons. 

This is it!

When the guns finally fall silent and the smoke dissipates, Morten stumbles towards you. 

[char0]: "It’s always good to know you can rely on your friends."

[char0]: "Although you took your sweet time about it!"[CTP]

[char0]: "You won’t believe what I got my hands on in Casablanca! Too bad the Nazis took everything. Ah well, maybe another time..."
You are probably the first people in many years to set foot in this deserted place. The desert sand has left little more than a few crumbling walls.
The meager remains of a few ruined walls in the desert sands mark the site of a former settlement. Today, the place is barren and deserted.
Only the foundations of this ancient, abandoned village remain. You find nothing of importance and continue your journey.
A few crumbling walls break the monotony of the desert dunes, presumably the ruins of some shepherds’ huts. They were abandoned many years ago.
You come across the remains of a desperate battle. Over countless years, the desert sands have reclaimed what was once denied them.
You discover some crooked tombstones in the desert sands. A dismal silence blankets this forsaken place.
The desert wind moans softly through the sun-bleached tombstones of this long-abandoned place.
Only the tips of the tombstones protrude from the sand. Soon, the shifting tides of the eternal desert will have reclaimed this place.
From afar, you see rows of tombstones in the wasteland. This ancient desert graveyard is desolate and deserted.
Behind the next dune, you see a few weathered tombstones. You maintain a respectful distance so as not to desecrate the place.
You come across some scraggy shrubs and trees defying the searing desert heat.
The relentless desert sun has parched the gnarled roots of a few tangled shrubs. They look like weird sculptures, twisted in agony.
A grove of tangled brush indicates that there must be water somewhere around here, but you find no sign of an overground source.
You find nothing here but a few parched trees and wiry bushes.
Despite the dryness and heat, a few crippled trees surrounded by some low shrubs survive here.
You hear the guttural bleating of the desert goats before they emerge from behind the next dune: The lonely herd wanders this desolate wilderness in search of its next paltry meal.
A small herd of goats grazes on the brushwood in front of you. The gaunt, wiry animals eye you curiously before turning back to their meager pasture.
The barren, gnarled shrubbery in this place has attracted some starving goats that huddle closer together when they see you.
The goats lounging lazily on the ground do not seem wild. You look around, but you do not see a shepherd.

In the distance you see what looks like an old temple structure. You stop to investigate and realise the entrance has caved in long ago.
You pass an old abandoned mine entrance. It is not accessible.
You notice a bunker in the distance. On closer inspection you realise it is locked tight.
Not far from the road you see an old water cistern. It is completely dried up.
On your next break you stop near a beautiful rock formation.
You stop near an old-growth tree before continuing your journey.
You come to halt near a half buried jeep. You quickly realise that there's nothing to be found here.
Promising colours in the distance turned out to be nothing but a mount of useless trash dumped here.
A few crates in the sand piqued your interest, but nothing of value could be found.
As you come around the corner you see a couple of rusty fuel canisters in the ground. They turn out to be completely empty.
The boundless desert in front of you is a sight to behold. Soon you continue your journey.
You are stopped by a lonely camel crossing the road. You let it pass and continue.
As you stop to stretch your legs you hear the bleat of a goat in the distance. You shrug and keep going.
A single sheep passes near your jeep. After a quick stop you drive off.
Halting near a group of bushes, you suddenly notice a snake slithering next to your feet. You cautiously move on.
A structure in the distance turns out to be a tattered Nazi tent. Nothing of value remains and you leave.
Around the next corner you discover a recently built tent. The skulls strewn on the ground are enough to make you leave this place quickly.
An old altar appears over the next dune. All the dried blood is making you feel uneasy and you move on.
The hills around you are filled with big bushes. You journey on after a quick stop.
Not far from your last stop you notice a pile of books - none of them in a readable state. Disappointed you leave.
When you halt next, you are surprised to find a few skulls buried in the sandy ground around you. You leave wondering what had taken place here.
A row of speared skulls make you stop your jeep. After a few minutes you have satisfied your curiousity and you continue your travels.
In the middle of the road you find an old map - it is completely undecipherable. You keep going.
You stop near some worn down stone structures. After a short while you drive off.
A long gone cold campfire gives you reason to stop and take a deep breath. Not wanting to waste time you depart again.
You stop the jeep immediately upon noticing a metalic object in the ground. You decide it is useless trash and leave.
As you stop you look upon a single lonely cactus growing in the desert. Shaking your heads you continue.
As soon as you notice the nazi flag you stop immediately and look around for danger. Soon you realise it is just an abandoned flag and leave.
Between a handful of rocks you are temporarily fascinated by a spider nest. Soon you jump back in your jeep and drive off.
You stop and notice the grassy patches covering the ground around you. You depart.
The old radio you noticed next to the tree turns out to be completely broken. You start your engines again and leave.

The dilapidated mud huts seem abandoned at first; then you see the rifles pointing out of the windows. 

The men’s faces relax when they realize you are not German soldiers. An elderly Berber approaches with a conciliatory gesture.

When the fighters learn of your search, they whisper excitedly. Their leader turns to you: 

[char0]: "Fortune is with you! Our scouts spotted your friend and his guards trekking through the desert."

Morten is alive! You thank the nomads for the information and head off in the direction they showed you.

Tire tracks in the sand and a shiny film of oil on the waterhole tell you that the Germans stopped here recently. 

As expected, the water turns out to be undrinkable - but among the palm trees you see something off to one side, glittering in the desert sand!

Curious, you examine your find: it is a silvered cigarette case with the engraved initials ML... 

It can only stand for Morten Lambert! There’s no doubt in your mind, he left this as a sign of life for you to find!

Morten has clearly not given up hope of rescue - but will you find him in time?

[char0]: "Sorry, but you won’t find Morten here."

The voice comes from somewhere in the shadows of the abandoned house you were about to search. 

Alarmed, you draw your weapons, but the stranger who appears in the door frame merely waves nonchalantly: 

[char0]: "Surely you wouldn’t shoot an innocent man?"

[char1]: "Perhaps I should introduce myself: Agent Cooper of the SIS. Morten was working for our... organization. He was looking into the matter of the Armenian Collection."

[char1]: "It looks like he managed to break into the Nazi office in Casablanca - but he doesn’t seem to have gotten very far."

[char1]: "I’m afraid that’s the last I heard from him. So we have no idea what he might have found."

The German scout you surprised at the abandoned supply station did not put up much resistance.

You search his document pouch while he strains ineffectually at his bonds. 

You soon come across some interesting passages:

"Regrettably, our arrest of the spy Lambert was only a partial success." 

"We secured all the missing items of the Armenian Collection, but Lambert succeeded in burning all the stolen documents before he was apprehended."

"Enhanced interrogation of the prisoner appears unavoidable. Ensure this is conducted immediately."

You leave the bound German behind and continue your journey - the clock is ticking!

The old man

To the South lie the foothills of the mighty Atlas mountain range. You see a small estate nestled between a cork oak plantation and some Aleppo pines. You hear the bleating of goats, and the air is rich with the gentle scent of juniper and thyme. 

The property belongs to a wealthy merchant who welcomes you as guests to his home.

The man dishes up mountains of couscous with chickpeas and mutton. After the meal you are offered fragrant mint tea.

Hours later, you bid farewell to the man and his family, and continue your journey with full stomachs.

The rising breeze carries the invigorating scent of eucalyptus and olive trees. 

Before moving on, you pause to marvel at the cloud formations that tower over the peaks of the mighty Atlas Mountains to your south.

As you pass through the outer buildings of the non-descript settlement, you stop in astonishment: The sheltered valley basin ahead of you is carpeted with purple flowers!

The heavy floral scent confirms your first guess: This must be a saffron plantation. The villagers kneel beside fragrant baskets: The harvest is in full swing!

The people have gathered in the village square to listen to the words of an old man: 

There can be no doubt: This is a marabout, a wise man and wandering preacher who roams the barren lands of North Africa. 

They are honored as true holy men. You move on, so as not to disturb the reverent mood.

You move deeper into the strange crystal landscape, until a dead end forces you to stop.

Barely avoiding a collision - your opponents take a nosedive into the desert sand and scramble frantically for cover!

As you approach the strange oasis with its mysterious crystals, your fears are confirmed: You are not alone!

You sneak closer and soon spy a group of German soldiers camped ahead of you. They are completely unaware of your presence.

A shot whistles over your heads - you have been ambushed by the Germans!

As you come over the dune ridge, two things catch your eye: The strange crystals around the oasis in front of you - and the detachment of German soldiers resting in their shade!

The soldiers jump up shouting when they see you! You hurl yourselves to the ground and return fire!

The road to Damascus

A caravan route crosses your dusty desert track. Some Bedouins are camped in the shade of the rocks. 
Beyond the rocky hills, further to the northeast, lies Damascus with its glorious palaces and pleasure gardens!

The Holy Land

In silent prayer, a group of women kneel before a half-ruined shrine. Of course - you are in the Holy Land, over which so many of the faithful have fought so bitterly...

Canaan, the land of a thousand cities and gods!

The divine Astarte once reigned here with her graceful temple servants, until the One God drove her away forever.

Canaan, where once milk and honey flowed - where are your gods today?
The desert hospice

The dilapidated building houses an infirmary run by nuns of the Carmelite Order. The charitable Carmelites care for the outcast and hopeless here. 

Further west, you see the ridge of the holy Mount Carmel, which runs along the Mediterranean coast. The convent must be somewhere on those mountain slopes.

[CTP]

When she sees you, an elderly nun approaches: 

[char0]: "Peace be with you! All are welcome here, as long as they do not disturb our peace."

Rest

Silently, but expertly, the sisters tend to your wounds and abrasions. After a meager but fortifying meal, they assign you an unadorned chamber where you can rest for a few hours. 

[CTP]

When you ask the Mother Superior what you owe her, she is is firm but friendly as she waves you away: 

[char0]: "We have everything we need for our work here. Go in peace!"
As you return to the Carmelite Hospice, the nuns nod to you in friendly greeting.
An olive grove

On the side of a hill, you come across a remote farmstead. The house adjoins a walled olive grove, whose branches bend under the weight of the olives. 

A sprightly old man is busy drawing water from his well to water the olive grove. When he sees you, he nods politely, but with cautious mistrust. 

You exchange a few words with the man, but soon move on.
Holy ground

You come across a group of exhausted travelers taking a break. These are Christian pilgrims on their way to the sites of the Holy Land. Their next destination is Nazareth, the home town of the man so many believe to be the son of God. 

It will soon be two thousand years since the Nazarene walked the Earth - but has the world really changed for the better since that time?

You are not so sure...
Old boundary stone

The stone cube next to the desert track bears faded Roman letters. You stop to examine the strange stone.

There’s no doubt about it: It’s an ancient Roman boundary stone. 

It probably marked the course of the Limes Arabicus, the ancient border with the wild horse tribes of the Arabian desert.
Cedar grove

The branches of cedar trees sway gently in the rising breeze. The Lebanon cedars in the grove are typical for the region. 

The ancient Phoenicians used these trees to build their slender galleys; individual trees can reach an age of over a thousand years.

You breathe in the resinous scent of the trees and move on, refreshed.
Old castle ruin

The castle ruin on the hill is clearly of Christian origin. Perhaps the remains of a Crusader stronghold?

This was probably an outpost of the hapless Principality of Antioch, which fell to the onslaughts of the Mamluks and the Mongols. 

These dismal walls are all that remains of the lofty ambitions of the crusader princes...
Roman military road

Between the dunes, the desert winds have uncovered the flagstones of an old army road that runs parallel to your track. A closer examination reveals that the flagstones are ancient. 

It is probably a section of the ancient Roman road known as the Via Nova Traiana, that connected inland Palmyra with Tarsus on the Mediterranean coast. Romans, Arabs, Crusaders, they all walked along this ancient military road - and now you follow in their footsteps!
Wild apricots

A heavy, enticing aroma pervades the rocky area. As you round the next bend, you find the source of the fragrance: a handful of wild apricot trees. 

[CTP] 

The branches of the trees are laden with fruit – so you decide to take a break. 

With stuffed bellies and in improved spirits, you finally move on.
A mountain river

The wooden bridge over the gurgling mountain torrent looks far from trustworthy – but if the Germans made it, you guess you too will survive the crossing!

The bridge creaks and sways menacingly... as you reach the middle, it sags by a few more inches! 

With your hearts in your mouths, you reach the other side without further incident!
Obsidian block

Not far from the path, a misshapen black object looms out of the sand. It appears to be a huge obsidian block of natural origin, hurled here by a volcanic eruption many eons ago.

You see the menacing silhouette of the Mount Süphan volcano in the distance. You feel tiny and vulnerable in the face of such timeless vastness. 

You set off again soon afterwards.
The abandoned village

The mud huts on your right appear lifeless in the desert sand. No human voices welcome you; there is no bleating of sheep in the distance. Not even the barking of dogs to mark your approach.

[CTP]

A search of the huts reveals nothing – but you do find a strange structure that sets your hair on end: Surrounded by unspeakable offerings, a malignant-looking statue of an enthroned pharaoh!

The evil emanating from the pitch-black basalt statue is palpable...

[CTP]

The statue's eyes follow you with an imperious leer, giving you an intense feeling of unease: You do not breathe easy again until you have clear skies above you, leaving the baleful gaze of Turash-Ra far behind!

The Brotherhood has obviously been here before you! You just hope the villagers got to safety in time...
A lone tent

You pull back the tent flap to find a bloated corpse - the man, apparently a Brotherhood messenger, must have died of thirst in this wasteland. 

You search his pockets and find a folded piece of paper: 

[CTP]

The document bears the confusing title 'The Marriage of the Seven':

The text is extremely flowery and full of confusing metaphors - but there is no doubt about it: It is a coded set of instructions for the revival of the Turash-Ra! 

After his death, the Black Pharaoh’s entrails were removed and stored in seven canopic jars. 

[CTP]

You do not understand all the obscure references but the core meaning is clear: 

If the cultists of the Khonesh Brotherhood really intend to reawaken the Black Pharaoh, they must reunite his mummy with the contents of those seven canopic jars!

You look at each other with renewed resolve: You will thwart this plan - no matter what!
The crazy old man

[CTP]

[char0]: "I saw it in my dreams – oh yes! A pyramid – black as night! Black as the souls of those deep within it, who seek to bring about the end of the world!"

[CTP]

[char0]: "I see it: They are very close to achieving their evil plans! Soon, yes! Soon! The stars will align, and HIS reign will come!"

Canals

You approach a half-ruined Ottoman guard house. The old bullet holes in the walls tell a tale: This outpost was probably the site of a fierce battle in the Great War when Arab fighters rose up against their Turkish masters!

Shattered filing cabinets and debris are all you find here.
Some camel traders

You stop as a herd of camels crosses your path. Some men nod to you as they pass. 

One of them stops for a moment. They are camel traders, driving their mares south along the coast to Sana'a.

When you ask him about Kharga Serabit, he just shrugs and gestures vaguely eastwards, into the heart of the Arabian desert...
The salt columns

The color of the ground changes almost imperceptibly from the usual ocher tones of the desert sand to a dirty white. 

When you meet some men working on a man-high dome with hammers and chisels, you realize they are mining rock salt. 

The exhausted men nod to you, then resume their strenuous work.
Some oryx antelopes

You startle a small herd of Arabian oryx antelopes nibbling at sparse, dried-up bushes. 

The shy animals flee as soon as they see you. 

Thoughtfully, you watch the animals as they run: No matter how inhospitable the environment, life always seems to find a way...
Two travelers

At a camel dung campfire you meet two unlikely companions. The smaller of the two is richly dressed. His companion appears to be an Agheyl fighter, a Bedouin warrior from the Iraqi borderland. 

You wonder what he is doing so far west, but the two men are not eager to talk about themselves. All they will say is that they are on their way to Medina.
The incense road

A cloying, aromatic fragrance wafts over from some frankincense trees along the track.

No wonder: this was once the main trade route for transporting the much sought-after incense in caravans from southern Arabia to the Mediterranean coast. 

But that was many years ago, before the desert dried up and became this empty space. Today the sun beats mercilessly down on you...
Deserted camp

Fragments of the camp still protrude from the desert sands - this place was obviously abandoned a few years ago. 

You wonder - could these be the remnants of one of the failed expeditions to the Empty Quarter? Bertram Thomas returned safely in 1931 and Jack Philby in the following year, but how many never made it back?
The old ruin

Little remains of the building beyond its foundation walls. Was this once a palace, a temple or a fortress?

The interior walls of the building bear a relief worn by time; it looks like a woman seated on a magnificent throne.
Examine relief
Decipher inscription

You are not quite sure, but the person depicted may well be the legendary Queen of Sheba. 

You struggle to remember half-forgotten lessons from your school years: That’s right! According to tradition, she was the ruler of a powerful East African empire suspected to be based somewhere near Aksum. 

[CTP]

Her visit to the court of King Solomon in Jerusalem is the stuff of legends: She is said to have showered him with gold and gems before becoming his lover. 

To this day, rumors abound of King Solomon's mines - somewhere in the Abyssinian mountains, filled to the brim with gold and precious stones...

The house of the guardians

The strange, gigantic rock has accompanied your journey for some time as a fixed point in the distance. Now you have finally reached it, you find an ancient portal on its eastern side that has collapsed under a recent rockfall.

Several strangely dressed corpses lie next to the shattered portal. Their lifeless bodies are covered with gaping wounds. 

One of the men moves. With difficulty, he beckons to you:

[CTP]

[char0]: "I am the last of the Guardians of the Divine Chariot. My brothers and I watched over the Merkaba – just as our forefathers did for the centuries since Nagusta the Cunning, son of the Queen of Sheba, brought the Divine Chariot to our mountains."

[CTP]

The myrrh harvesters

The old fig tree

[CTP]
